snippet: Hearing-impaired people may restrict their activity because they worry about damaging delicate hearing aids in the humidity of gyms or underwater. Siemens has introduced what it says is the first waterproof hearing aid.
abstract: Hearing-impaired people may restrict their activity because they worry about damaging delicate hearing aids in the humidity of gyms or underwater. Siemens has introduced what it says is the first waterproof hearing aid.

headline.main: A Waterproof Hearing Aid From Siemens
headline.print_headline: With a Waterproof Hearing Aid, More Options for Users
